text.__SUMMARY__: Fritillaria gussichiae is a European plant species in the lily family, native to Bulgaria, North Macedonia, Serbia, Albania, and Greece.The plants were once considered part of F. graeca but more recent studies suggest it is a distinct species more closely related to F. pontica.
